html:
OneFootball

Andrew Thompson¬∑20 April 2025

üö® Club Am√©rica trounce Mazatl√°n during huge Clausura win

Two giants of Mexican football were in action tonight across Saturday's billing of Liga MX Clausura play.

Here is how it all went down tonight.

OneFootball Videos

Club Am√©rica 5-0 Mazatl√°n

Scorers: D√°vila 4', 51' (pen), Fidalgo 13', 59', Aguirre 75'

Two goals inside the opening 15 minutes of action at¬†Estadio Ciudad de los Deportes set the tone as Club Am√©rica earned a 5-0 Clausura win over Mazatl√°n.

Victor¬†D√°vila's goal in the fourth minute was a sign of things to come from¬†Andr√© Jardine's¬†√Åguilas, with √Ålvaro¬†Fidalgo adding a second just ten minutes later.

The halftime whistle could not have come soon enough for Mazatl√°n as Am√©rica remained dominant throughout the opening 45 minutes of action.

But that state of play would continue after the interval, and the home side would find two more strikes before the hour mark, with D√°vila and Fidalgo each completing braces and Rodrigo Aguirre joining in on the action 15 minutes from full-time.

Graciously, Am√©rica were unable to find a sixth before full-time, but the emphatic result sees the iconic Mexican side climb up to second in the table.

Still to come...

üì∏ Hector Vivas - 2025 Getty Images
